/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The street, curving gently to the right, is flanked by a variety of buildings and trees. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The trees, lush and green, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. In the distance, power lines stretch across the sky, connecting the buildings and adding a sense of depth to the scene. The image is captured from a low angle, making the buildings appear taller and more imposing. The overall perspective gives a sense of being right there on the street, looking up at the buildings and the sky.
